title: P1009_高精度计算
content: #include<iostream>#include<cstring>using namespace std;//高精度加法:将b的内容加到a;void add(int a[], int b[]) {	for (int i = 1; i <= b[0]; i++){		a[i] = a[i]+b[i];		a[i + 1] += a[i]/10;		a[i] %= 10;	}	if (a[a[0] + 1] > 0) a[0]++;	return;} //高精度乘法void mul(int a[], int b) {		for (int i = 1; i <= a[0]; i++) a[i] *= b;		for (int i = 1; i <= a[0]; i++) {			a[i + 1] += a[i] / 10;			a[i] %= 10;		}		while (a[a[0]+1] > 0) {			a[0]++;			a[a[0] + 1] = a[a[0]] / 10;			a[a[0]] %= 10;		}	}int main() {	int n;//阶乘最大的循环次数;	int arr[200];//记录下n的高精度数组;	int sum[200];//求和数组;	memset(sum, 0, sizeof(sum));	memset(arr, 0, sizeof(arr));	cin >> n;	arr[0] = 1;	arr[1] = 1;	sum[0] = 1;	if (n == 0) cout << 0;	else {		if (n == 1)cout << 1;		else {			for (int i = 1; i <=n; i++) {				mul(arr, i);//阶乘:数组a从1乘到n;				add(sum, arr);//每次阶乘的结果都加起来			}			sum[0] = arr[0];			for (int i = sum[0]; i > 0; i--) cout << sum[i];		}	}}

title: P1035_倒数累加
content: #include <iostream>using namespace std;int main(){    int K;    double S=0,n=1;    cin>>K;    while (S<=K)    {        S+=(1/n);        n++;    }    cout<<n-1;     return 0;}

title: P1014_Cantor表
content: #include<iostream>using namespace std;int main() {	int Number;//输入数的顺序    int line_number=0;//斜行数	int Sum=0;//前几行数字总量	cin >> Number;	while (Sum < Number) {		line_number++;		Sum = line_number * (line_number + 1) / 2;  	}	Sum = (line_number - 1) * line_number / 2;	int remain= Number - Sum;	if (line_number % 2 == 0) { 		cout << remain << '/' << line_number - remain + 1;	}	else { 		cout << line_number - remain + 1 << '/' << remain;	}	return 0;}

title: P1046_条件筛选_
content: #include<iostream>using namespace std;main(){    int a[10],stretchlong,mun=0;    for(int i=1;i<=10;i++) cin>>a[i];    cin>>stretchlong;    for(int i=1;i<=10;i++)        if(stretchlong+30>=a[i])        mun++;    cout<<mun;    return 0;}

title: P1085_二维数组计数
content: #include<iostream>using namespace std;int main() {	int a[7][2];	int unup[7];	int j,max=0;	for (int i = 0; i < 7; i++) {		for (int j = 0; j < 2; j++) {			cin >> a[i][j];		}		int sum = a[i][0] + a[i][1];		if (sum > 8) {			unup[i] = sum;		}		else unup[i] = 0;	}	for (int i = 0; i < 7; i++) {		unup[i] > max ? max = unup[i] : max = max;	}	for (j = 0; j < 7; j++) {		if (unup[j] == max)			break;	}	if (max == 0)cout << 0;	else cout << j+1;	return 0;}

title: P1047_数组计数
content: #include<cstdio>#include<iostream>using namespace std;int main(){	int l, m,u,v;	int count=0;	cin >> l >> m;	int L[10001];	for (int i = 0; i <= l; i++) L[i] = 0;	for (int i = 0; i < m; i++)	{		cin >> u >> v;		for (int j = u; j <=v; j++) {			L[j] = 1;		}	}	for (int i = 0; i <= l; i++)	{		if (L[i] == 0) count++;	}	cout << count << endl;	return 0;}

title: P1059_去重和排序
P1089_数组计数
content: #include<iostream>using namespace std;int main() {	int M[12];//12个月的预算    int RESIDUE=0;//每月初的money    int PINMONEY = 0;//每月末的money    int DEPOSIT = 0;//存款	for (int i = 0; i < 12; i++)cin >>M[i];	for (int i = 0; i < 12; i++) {		RESIDUE = PINMONEY + 300 - M[i];//		if (RESIDUE >= 0) {//存款			DEPOSIT += ((RESIDUE / 100)*100);			PINMONEY = (RESIDUE % 100);		}		else {			cout << -(i + 1); 			break;		}		if (i == 11)cout << DEPOSIT * 1.2+PINMONEY;	}	return 0;}

title: P1138_桶排序
content: #include<iostream>using namespace std;int main() {	int n, k;	int array[30001]={0};	int number;	int counter = 0;	int sign=1;	cin >> n >> k;	for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {		cin >> number;		array[number] = 1;	}	for(int i=0;i<30001;i++){		if (array[i] == 1)counter++;		if (counter == k) {			cout << i;			return 0;		}	}	cout << "NO RESULT";	return 0;}

title: P1421
content: #include <iostream>using namespace std;int main(){    int a,b;    cin>>a>>b;    if(a>10000||b>9)        cout<<"输入错误"<<endl;    int i=(a*10+b)/19;    cout<<i;    return 0;}

title: P1422
content: #include<iostream>#include<iomanip>using namespace std;int main(){	int n; double m;	cin >> n;	if (n <= 150) m = n * 0.4463;	else 	{		if (n <= 400) m = (n-150) * 0.4663+150*0.4463;		else m = (n-400) * 0.5663+250*0.4663+150*0.4463;	}	cout <<setiosflags(ios::fixed)<<setprecision(1)<< m; 	return 0;}

title: P1425
content: #include<iostream>using namespace std;int main()	{		int a, b, c, d, e, f;		cin >> a >> b >> c >> d;		if (d >= b)		{			e = c - a;			f = d - b;		}		else		{			e = c - a - 1;			f = 60 - b + d;		}		cout << e << " " << f;		return 0;	}
